alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley; West Central Basin and Range; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 05 at 7:46PM MDT until May 06 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR MOST OF NORTHERN AND CENTRAL NEW MEXICO DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SUNDAY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHERN AND EASTERN NEW MEXICO DUE TO STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND AN UNSTABLE ATMOSPHERE... .Winds are subsiding this evening, but additional rounds of strong southwest winds, low humidity, seasonably warm temperatures, and an unstable airmass will lead to critical fire weather conditions below snowpack through the weekend. Widespread critical fire weather is expected Saturday over all but northwestern New Mexico. Critical conditions will then focus toward the eastern half of the region Sunday. Critical conditions may persist into the middle of next week. In addition, lightning strikes from earlier this week may lead to new ignitions in receptive fuels. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * AREA AND TIMING...Middle Rio Grande Valley (Zone 106), West Central Mountains (Zone 105), and West Central Basin and Range (Zone 109) Saturday from noon to 8 pm MDT. * 20 FOOT WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph Saturday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...6 to 13 percent Saturday afternoon. Four to 8 consecutive hours of single digit humidity are likely Saturday in the Middle Rio Grande Valley. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley; West Central Basin and Range; West Central Mountains
